title: So let me get this fucking straight..
body:
So you fucking add a restriction to those who curse out fucking trolls and feeders from Ranked games.

BUT NOT THE ACTUAL FUCKING TROLLS AND FEEDERS!?


Yup Riot Listens.. Riot totally listens..

Assholes.


The worse part of this is I have to do it in fucking Draft Normals. not Team builder Normals..
